author: Frances Martel
title: Report: Wuhan Funeral Homes Burn Victims Alive...
description: Report: Wuhan Funeral Homes Burn Victims Alive... (Top headline, 3rd story, link ) Related stories: Pink Moon linked to 'end of days' omen... 'PANDEMIC DREAMS' HAUNTING NATION'S SLEEP... One in five NYPD officers call out... Pressure on LA to Shut Mass Transi…
content: Locals in Wuhan, where the Chinese coronavirus pandemic originated, have heard screams coming from funeral home furnaces, and some treated in hospitals say they saw workers put living coronavirus patients in body bags, Radio Free Asia (RFA) reported on Monday… [+5099 chars]
